en: Narrator: Peppa and George are very excited today. It is snowing outside.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治今天非常兴奋。外面正在下雪。

examples.en: It is raining outside.
It is sunny outside.

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, can we go and play in the snow?
cn: 佩奇：妈妈，我们可以去雪地里玩吗？

sentence.en: Can we go and play in the snow?
sentence.cn: 我们可以去雪地里玩吗？

examples.en: Can we go and play in the rain?

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, but it’s very cold outside so you must wrap up warm.
cn: 猪妈妈：可以，但外面很冷，你们要穿暖和点。

en: Daddy Pig: And don’t forget to wear your hats and scarves and gloves.
cn: 猪爸爸：别忘了戴帽子、围巾和手套。

sentence.en: wear your hats and scarves and gloves

examples.en: wear your boots and raincoats
wear your helmets and knee pads

en: Narrator: It is very cold outside. Peppa and George must wear their hats and scarves and gloves.
cn: 旁白：外面很冷，佩奇和乔治必须戴上帽子、围巾和手套。

en: Peppa Pig: Come on, George.
cn: 佩奇：快点，乔治。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George are making footprints in the snow.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治正在雪地里踩脚印。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love making footprints in the snow.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治喜欢在雪地里踩脚印。

en: Narrator: Oh dear.
cn: 旁白：哦，糟糕。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s not funny.
cn: 佩奇：不好笑。

en: Peppa Pig: George, let’s play snowballs.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，我们来打雪仗吧。

examples.en: let’s play football
let’s play hide and seek

en: Narrator: Peppa has made a snowball.
cn: 旁白：佩奇做了一个雪球。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。

en: Peppa Pig: George, come back, you little piggy.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，回来，你这个小猪。

en: Narrator: Oh dear. Maybe this game is getting a little too rough.
cn: 旁白：哦，糟糕。这个游戏可能有点太激烈了。

sentence.en: this game is getting a little too rough
sentence.cn: 这个游戏可能有点太激烈了

examples.en: this game is getting a little too difficult
examples.cn: 这个游戏可能有点太难了

examples.en: this game is getting a little too boring
examples.cn: 这个游戏可能有点太无聊了

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry, George.
cn: 佩奇：对不起，乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: George, let’s build a snowman.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，我们来堆雪人吧。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George are making a snowman. First they make a body.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治正在堆雪人。首先他们做了一个身体。

en: Peppa Pig: George, this is the snowman’s body.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，这是雪人的身体。

en: Narrator: Now they make the snowman’s head.
cn: 旁白：现在他们做雪人的头。

en: Peppa Pig: Now he needs arms and eyes and a mouth.
cn: 佩奇：现在他需要胳膊、眼睛和嘴巴。

en: Narrator: George has found some sticks for the snowman’s arms.
cn: 旁白：乔治找来了一些树枝做雪人的胳膊。

en: Narrator: Peppa has found some stones for the snowman’s eyes and mouth.
cn: 旁白：佩奇找来了一些石头做雪人的眼睛和嘴巴。

en: Peppa Pig: This is his face.
cn: 佩奇：这是他的脸。

en: Peppa Pig: Now the snowman needs a nose.
cn: 佩奇：现在雪人需要一个鼻子。

en: Narrator: Peppa has got a carrot to make the snowman’s nose.
cn: 旁白：佩奇拿了根胡萝卜做雪人的鼻子。

sentence.en: Peppa has got a carrot to make the snowman’s nose.
sentence.cn: 佩奇拿了根胡萝卜做雪人的鼻子。

examples.en: Peppa has got a stick to make the snowman’s arm.
examples.cn: 佩奇拿了一根树枝做雪人的胳膊。

examples.en: Peppa has got a stone to make the snowman’s eye.
examples.cn: 佩奇拿了一块石头做雪人的眼睛。

en: Narrator: The snowman looks very happy, but maybe he is a bit cold.
cn: 旁白：雪人看起来很开心，但可能有点冷。

sentence.en: maybe he is a bit cold

examples.en: maybe he is a bit tired
maybe he is a bit hungry

en: Peppa Pig: The snowman needs some clothes to keep him warm.
cn: 佩奇：雪人需要一些衣服来保暖。

sentence.en: The snowman needs some clothes to keep him warm.
sentence.cn: 雪人需要一些衣服来保暖。

examples.en: The snowman needs a hat to keep him warm.
examples.cn: 雪人需要一顶帽子来保暖。

examples.en: The snowman needs a scarf to keep him warm.
examples.cn: 雪人需要一条围巾来保暖。

en: Narrator: George has found some clothes to keep the snowman nice and warm.
cn: 旁白：乔治找来了一些衣服让雪人暖和起来。

en: Narrator: The snowman is wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.
cn: 旁白：雪人戴上了帽子、围巾和手套。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, Daddy, come and look.
cn: 佩奇：妈妈，爸爸，快来看。

examples.en: come and see
come and play

en: Narrator: Mummy Pig is wearing her hat and scarf and gloves.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈戴上了帽子、围巾和手套。

en: Mummy Pig: That is the best snowman I have ever seen.
cn: 猪妈妈：这是我见过最棒的雪人。

sentence.en: the best snowman I have ever seen

examples.en: the best cake I have ever tasted
the best game I have ever played

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig looks quite cold. He isn’t wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸看起来很冷，他没有戴帽子、围巾和手套。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, why aren’t you wearing your hat and scarf and gloves?
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，你为什么没戴帽子、围巾和手套？

sentence.en: why aren’t you wearing your hat and scarf and gloves?
sentence.cn: 你为什么没戴帽子、围巾和手套？

examples.en: why aren’t you wearing your coat?
why aren’t you wearing your boots?

en: Daddy Pig: I don’t know where they are. I can’t find them anywhere.
cn: 猪爸爸：我不知道它们在哪，哪儿都找不到。

examples.en: I can’t find my keys anywhere.
examples.cn: 哪儿都找不到我的钥匙。

examples.en: I can’t find my glasses anywhere.
examples.cn: 哪儿都找不到我的眼镜。

en: Mummy Pig: I think I know where Daddy’s hat, scarf and gloves are.
cn: 猪妈妈：我想我知道爸爸的帽子、围巾和手套在哪。

sentence.en: I think I know where Daddy’s hat, scarf and gloves are.
sentence.cn: 我想我知道爸爸的帽子、围巾和手套在哪。

examples.en: I think I know who stole my lunch.
examples.cn: 我想我知道谁偷了我的午餐。

examples.en: I think I know which book I left at school.
examples.cn: 我想我知道我把哪本书落在学校了。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig’s hat and scarf and gloves are on the snowman.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸的帽子、围巾和手套在雪人身上。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦。
